title: 8 Deliciously Easy Sheet Pan Dinners for Two
description: Looking for sheet pan dinners for two? Check out this collection of easy dinner ideas that serve two people, all baked in a sheet pan. Whether it's a sheet pan chicken dinner for two or a veggie-packed meal you're after, we have it all here.

About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE Never lose a recipe: Join MyRecipes to save and find favorites from AR & beyond 8 Deliciously Easy Sheet Pan Dinners for Two By Diana Moutsopoulos Diana Moutsopoulos Diana Moutsopoulos is a food writer, recipe developer, Greek cuisine expert, and Senior Editorial Director at Allrecipes. Allrecipes' editorial guidelines Published on May 18, 2021 Close Credits: France C Stuck in a rut while cooking for two? Sick of doing dishes? Wish you had ideas for tasty dinners that are easy to make, too? If you answered yes to all of these questions, look no further! We've rounded up our best sheet pan meals for two in this collection, which includes lots of variety — whether you're craving a home-cooked chicken dinner or a veggie-packed meatless Monday meal. Preheat the oven and take a look — dinner will be ready in no time! 01 of 09 Sheet Pan Chorizo with Potatoes and Asparagus for Two View Recipe Save Chorizo sausage is full of flavor, meaning you don't have to do much else to make a winning dinner other than toss it with veggies and bake. The glowing reviews keep coming in for this easy sheet pan supper, with a lot of reviewers using whichever sausages they have on hand. Reviewer Jennifer gives this recipe the seal of approval: "So easy and flavorful! I use Portuguese [Linguica] instead of chorizo and it tastes amazing. I've been making this almost weekly and now I make extra to have leftovers." 02 of 09 Halloumi Sheet Pan Meal for Two View Recipe Save Buckwheat Queen Halloumi cheese is a vegetarian mealtime dream, easily transforming into a satisfying meal without a lot of effort. Here, halloumi is baked with a unique array of veggies, including radishes, bell peppers, and butternut squash. The addition of serrano chile, black olives, and za'atar seasoning take everything to the next level. Follow the recipe for incredible results, or use it as a guide to use up whatever vegetables you have on hand. 03 of 09 Parma Wrapped Chicken with Mediterranean Vegetables View Recipe Save kellieann Wrapping the chicken in prosciutto keeps it deliciously moist and also lends flavor to the rest of the pan — a blend of Mediterranean-style vegetables including potatoes, bell peppers, zucchini, and tomatoes. This recipe calls for two chicken breasts, but you could easily use two chicken thighs if that's what you prefer. 04 of 09 Easy Vegan Sheet Pan Roasted Cauliflower, Tomatoes, and Garbanzo Beans View Recipe Save Make a plant-based dinner for two in no time with a can of chickpeas and your favorite veggies from the fridge. BeccaB gives this recipe five stars: "Loved it! Tasted great and made a quick, healthy weeknight dinner." 05 of 09 One-Pan Rosemary Chicken Thighs and Roasted Winter Vegetables for Two View Recipe Save Chicken thighs roast to perfection along with carrots, turnips, potato, garlic and onion. It's a hearty and comforting sheet pan meal for two that can easily be transformed to any season by using spring, summer, or fall veggies. 06 of 09 Sheet Pan Chicken Dinner for Two View Recipe Save The rave reviews keep coming in for this hectic weeknight dinner solution by Allrecipes Allstar France C. France calls for store-bought Greek salad dressing to bring a ton of flavor to this simple dinner for two without a ton of ingredients. You could easily try using Italian dressing if that's what you have on hand — both will help keep the chicken juicy and packed with flavor. 07 of 09 Roasted Leeks with Eggs View Recipe Save This keto and paleo-friendly sheet pan meal is a great breakfast-for-dinner option. If you use a store-bought vinaigrette, it's a recipe requiring just five ingredients. If you're not paleo or keto, some nice toast or pita bread is a great addition to round out the meal. Or if you've got room in the oven, try these Sheet Pan Breakfast Potatoes. 08 of 09 Sheet Pan Keto Chicken Sausage with Roasted Brussels Sprouts and Tomatoes View Recipe Save A low-carb sheet pan dinner for two featuring chicken sausage and keto-friendly veggies. As with many or most sheet pan meals, you can easily use this recipe as a base and change up the ingredients according to what you have on hand. Almost any sausage would work well in place of the chicken sausage, and other vegetable options include broccoli, cauliflower, or asparagus. 09 of 09 More Inspiration bd.weld Our entire recipe collection of Sheet Pan Dinners will keep you inspired with loads of dinner ideas. And don't forget to check out our Cooking for Two recipe collection. Pictured: Surf and Turf for Two Our Best Dinner Ideas for Two Simple Skillet Dinners for Two Explore more: Recipes Everyday Cooking Sheet Pan Dinner Recipes Was this page helpful?
